title: Majorette
credit_line: Gift of Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Benton Murdoch Spruance [1904-1967], Philadelphia, PA. Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, by May 1956 until April 11, 1957 [1]; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, April 1957 [2].

Notes:
[1]. Mrs. Beal acquired the woodcut before May 1956. It appears on a list of Spruance prints (this one with a valuation of $30,) which were sent to Carnegie Institute at that time "For addition to other prints by Spruance."
[2]. The woodcut was accessioned on April 11, 1957.
